text:
Has anyone know how to *add* a new HubDB record with a workflow action?
or any other recommendation adding HubDB record dynamically? like Zapier or workflow action code?
Thank you in advance.

Hi  All, How are you?
I am new in HS, I am not sure how to integrate with HubSpot Oauth( form submit and social involved) on vue project
Any ideas for me?
Hope looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Thanks Million :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks <@U38EZFVFE> I am really new to Serverless but I just spend sometime and its interesting, but I am still confused how I can use serverless function within  my workflow as an action and copy values in it...

And do you have any example code that HubDb record add/edit with serverless?

Thanks for your time!
